Detailed Description

Minimum Description Length used as an edge score.

See Also
plNodeScoreMDL, plEdgeScoreFromNodeScore.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

plEdgeScoreMDL::plEdgeScoreMDL ( plDataDescriptor &  data_desc)
inlineexplicit

Construct an MDL edge score object operating on a given dataset.

Parameters
data_descthe data descriptor ;

Note that the object keeps a reference to the dataset, so don't destroy it during the lifetime of the score object.

Construct an MDL edge score object operating on a given dataset.

Parameters
data_descthe data descriptor ;
conditioning_variablesthe variables condioning the score If this parameter is not empty, the score is assumed to be conditional

Note that the object keeps a reference to the dataset, so don't destroy it during the lifetime of the score object.
